articles.title: Are white South Africans facing a genocide as Donald Trump claims? - BBC
articles.description: US President Donald Trump says a genocide is taking place in South Africa, a claim a judge dismissed as "imaginary".
articles.content:
US President Donald Trump has given members of South Africa's Afrikaner community refugee status, alleging that a genocide was taking place in the country. 
Nearly 60 of them have arrived in the US … [+7940 chars]
